title: bhagavatE rudrAya
sahitya:
bhagavatE rudrAya pArvati ramaNAya bhaktavatsalAya namO namO


anupallavi

  nigama shaIrAya nIla lOhitAya khaga vAhanAtyamara kAmita dAyakAya


caraNam    indu lasita jaTAcUDa shObhAya ENIdhrtakarA shObhitAya
 mandahAsa madhra vacanAya vandita gaNEshAya harikEshAya
